channel.title: CVE Feed for ATOM tech Inc. -- ATOM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ATOM tech Inc. -- ATOM

item.title: CVE-2021-20732|2024-08-03T17:53:21.907Z -- atom%20tech%20inc. -- atom
item.description: The ATOM (ATOM - Smart life App for Android versions prior to 1.8.1 and ATOM - Smart life App for iOS versions prior to 1.8.2) does not verify server certificate properly, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to eavesdrop on encrypted communication via a crafted certificate.
